name: FAutoReimportDirectoryConfig
doc: Auto reimport settings for a specific directory

SourceDirectory: Path to a virtual package path (eg /Game/ or /MyPlugin/), or absolute paths on disk where your source content files reside.
MountPoint: (Optional) Specify a virtual mout point (e.g. /Game/) to map this directory to on disk. Doing so allows auto-creation of assets when a source content file is created in this folder (see below).
Wildcards: (Optional) Specify a set of wildcards to include or exclude files from this auto-reimporter.
